```{r}
#| label: tromso

tromso <- readr::read_rds("city_links/city_links_tromso.rds")
```

```{r}
#| label: fig-tromso_map
#| fig-cap: "Kart over TromsÃ¸."

tromso |>
    leaflet(
      width = "100%",
      height = 700,
      options =
        leafletOptions(
          crs = nvdb_crs,
          zoomControl = F
        )
    ) |>
    addTiles(
      urlTemplate = nvdb_map_url,
      attribution = nvdb_map_attribution
    ) |>
  
    addCircleMarkers(
      radius = 6,
      stroke = T,
      weight = 2,
      opacity = 0.8,
      fill = F,
      fillOpacity = 0.8,
      label = ~label_text
    )
```
